channel.title: █ New VPS █
channel.description:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Anyone know how to fix it... Java is installed and the compiler works Here is run.bat
[code]@echo off cd Source/Bin title RovaScape java server pause[/code]

item.title: █ New VPS █

item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Set your Classpath/Path?
Set the paths and it always works? :s
